title: Charlie Kaplan from Cymbal.FM
itunes:title: Charlie Kaplan from Cymbal.FM
description:
Episode 264 - This week is a rad chat with Charlie Kaplan who works at Cymbal.FM which is an incredible app that makes it extremely easy to discover, share and enjoy music in ways that I haven’t experienced before. We discuss Web 2.0 culture, music discovery and journalism (as he spent some time at NPR prior to this). Enjoy! Immerse yourself in awesome with Audible. Get a free audiobook w/ a 30 day trial today!Use our Amazon Affiliate Code to support the show!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
